snippet.title: Is 'affordable art' really all that affordable?
snippet.description:
* Featuring everything from hand-painted heels to a live (and semi-naked) woman, Hong Kong's latest art fair wrapped Sunday with sales topping HK$39 million ($5 million) -- up 50% on last year's inaugural event.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/25/travel/hong-kong-affordable-art-fair/index.html

snippet.title: Dutch city turns church into a luxury experience
snippet.description:
* It has been a while since I've enjoyed going to church so much.
